creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
description: abstract image; brightly colored pigments throughout; background is mostly yellow with black sections; bright orange splatter in lower center; turquoise section in middle right; dark horizontal and diagonal lines throughout

medium: Archival pigment print on Epson Ultra Smooth Fine Art paper
signed: LRC in pencil: R Weingarten | LLC on back in pencil: PALETTE SERIES: CHUCK ARNOLDI #1, (SCRAPER) 2004
title: Palette Series: Chuck Arnoldi #1, (Scraper)
